name: Date & Time
semantic_context: Allows you to manipulate date and time values
natural_language_description: 这是 Date & Time 节点。主要用于: Allows you to manipulate date and time values

noticeDateTime.displayName:
More powerful date functionality is available in expressions,
e.g. {{ $now.plus(1, 'week') }}
noticeDateTime.name: noticeDateTime
noticeDateTime.natural_language_description:
参数名: More powerful date functionality is available in expressions,
e.g. {{ $now.plus(1, 'week') }}

action.name: action
action.natural_language_description: 参数名: Action | 默认值: format
available_options: Calculate a Date (值: calculate) - Add or subtract time from a date
Format a Date (值: format) - Convert a date to a different format

value.name: value
value.description: The date string or timestamp from which you want to add/subtract time
value.natural_language_description: 参数名: Date Value | 作用: The date string or timestamp from which you want to add/subtract time | (必填项)

dataPropertyName.name: dataPropertyName
dataPropertyName.description: Name of the output property to which to write the converted date
dataPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Property Name | 作用: Name of the output property to which to write the converted date | 默认值: data | (必填项)

custom.name: custom
custom.description: Whether a predefined format should be selected or custom format entered
custom.natural_language_description: 参数名: Custom Format | 作用: Whether a predefined format should be selected or custom format entered | 默认值: False

toFormat.name: toFormat
toFormat.description: The format to convert the date to
toFormat.natural_language_description: 参数名: To Format | 作用: The format to convert the date to | 默认值: MM/DD/YYYY
available_options: MMMM DD YYYY (值: MMMM DD YYYY) - Example: April 09 1986

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: fromFormat (值: None) - Format for parsing the value as a date. If unrecognized, specify the format for the value.

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: add | (必填项)
available_options: Add (值: add) - Add time to Date Value
Subtract (值: subtract) - Subtract time from Date Value

duration.name: duration
duration.description: E.g. enter “10” then select “Days” if you want to add 10 days to Date Value.
duration.natural_language_description: 参数名: Duration | 作用: E.g. enter “10” then select “Days” if you want to add 10 days to Date Value. | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

timeUnit.name: timeUnit
timeUnit.description: Time unit for Duration parameter above
timeUnit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Time Unit | 作用: Time unit for Duration parameter above | 默认值: days | (必填项)
